name: Fuddler

ability.name: Ore Detector
ability.description: When activated, generates subtle vibrations to detect nearby ore.

description: Its large claws boast of diamond-like hardness. However, sharpening these claws consumes most of its energy, leading it to sometimes spending entire days doing nothing else.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Stone Blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: Stone Cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Power Bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: Sand Tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Rock Lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.
